Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: We did a wine and cheese tasting here, and it was 100% worth it. Friendly and knowledgeable staff taught us all about the various cheeses we sampled (about ten cheese total). It was a great and relaxing experience and lasted about two hours. Would highly recommend.

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: We splurged for a cheese tasting paired with beer (there's also the wine option), and it was so much worth it. These people really like their cheeses and talking about it. They also have an annex store, with dozens (likely a hundred) types of cheeses to take home.

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: A nice gezellig place. Good terrace for corona times. Good wine and excellent cheese. Available seating in the terrasse with very helpful and nice staff

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: Great cheeses, friendly and helpful staff, great wine and cheese pairing

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: Amazing! Food was excellent, sparkling cider was perfect and the staff were so great and knowledgeable. We'll be back over and over again!

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: Nice selection of wines and cheese

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: Did a wine and cheese tasting on Sunday and it was even better than expected. Great cheese and wine selection and great service.

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: Great food, great service and all you want to know about cheese

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: Very nice service and calm atmosphere, delicious food for a quite reasonable price

Name: Proeflokaal Kef
Review Text: Cheese from KEF, now on rolls from KEF... Another nice and new lunchroom in this neighborhood, with taste and quality.
